org.apache.nutch.fetcher

Class FetcherThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.nutch.fetcher.FetcherThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FetcherThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class picks items from queues and fetches the pages.
